Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs out of all completed reimbursement cases (i.e., those ending in Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR immediately following Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Number of times Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR appears in variants that do not contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that lead directly to Request Payment without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurring after Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER compared to after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events that belong to cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of the frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR to the frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that originate from a path including Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that occur within three steps after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of the number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR to the number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that are not preceded by any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is the last approval step before Request Payment, excluding paths involving Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR events per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that include at least one rejection by any role versus those with no rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR is reached without any prior interaction with PRE_APPROVER (i.e., skipping Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases
